m_szDocTitle: 35% Increase In Tesla Model S Orders In Q4 2015 vs Q4 2014 | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: 35% Increase In Tesla Model S Orders In Q4 2015 vs Q4 2014 Originally published on EV Obsession . One of the bigger and perhaps more believable claims from Tesla* critics in the investment/media world in the past few weeks has been the claim that Tesla Model S demand is weakening. When asked about Model S demand on Tesla’s quarterly conference call, which concluded moments ago, Tesla execs indicated that demand was very good and something they were happy about, basically refuting any baseless (i.e., pulled out of thin air) criticisms on this matter. In Tesla’s Q4 2015 letter to shareholders ,
